extensionDescription.message: Effortlessly manage your browser extensions with advanced grouping, profiling, and control features.

offlineBannerMessage.message: You appear to be offline or experiencing connection issues.

modalIntroText.message: This message indicates a potential problem with your internet connection. Here are common steps to try:

step1.message: Check Your Connection: Ensure you are connected to the correct Wi-Fi or your Ethernet cable is plugged in.

step2.message: Restart Equipment: Turn off your router and modem for 30 seconds, then turn them back on.

step3.message: Reload Page: A simple refresh can fix temporary glitches. Press F5 or Cmd+R.

step4.message: Test Other Sites: See if you can access other websites like google.com.

step5.message: Disable VPN/Proxy: Temporarily turn off any VPN or proxy services you're using.

step6.message: Firewall/Antivirus: Check your security software to ensure it's not blocking your browser.

step7.message: Restart Computer: A full system restart can resolve many underlying issues.

authors_description.message: The core team behind the development and design of modcore Extension Manager.

canvrs_description.message: Leading the project's development and architectural design, handling everything from code to user interface planning.

aliana_description.message: A key developer and co-founder involved in all aspects of the project, ensuring a seamless and functional experience.

contributors_description.message: We are grateful for all community contributions. This section will highlight them soon.

credits_description.message: modcore Extension Manager is built and maintained with the help of these incredible tools.

canva_description.message: Used to craft the project's distinctive logo and branding materials.

github_description.message: The foundation of our project. Utilized for version control, collaboration, API requests, and data fetching.

inter_description.message: The clean, professional typeface that defines the look and feel of the extension's user interface.

mynaui_description.message: A library of beautifully designed SVG icons that enhance the extension's visual appeal and usability.

google_services_description.message: The backbone of the extension's functionality, including chrome.storage.sync for data synchronization, Google Forms for gathering user feedback, and the robust Chromium platform itself.

policies_description.message: A collection of official policies, guidelines, and legal documents for the modcore Extension Manager project.

sponsor_description.message: Learn how you can support the project financially.

privacy_description.message: Details on how user data is handled and protected.

license_description.message: The open-source license governing the use and distribution of this project.

security_description.message: Our policy for reporting security vulnerabilities.

contributing_description.message: A guide for developers who want to contribute to the codebase.

code_of_conduct_description.message: Our community standards for a safe and welcoming environment.
